com.htsmart.wristband.performer

接口 IDevicePerformer


  • public interface IDevicePerformer
    To perform some instructions on the wristband. Get instance like this: 
     IDevicePerformer performer = WristbandApplication.getDevicePerformer();
    Use addPerformerListener(PerformerListener) to monitor instructions send state and result. And removePerformerListener(PerformerListener) to remove a listener.

    The method with prefix 'cmd_' generally only performs a single instruction operation. If the instruction is added to the queue successfully, the method return true. And then the actual send result of the instruction is sent to PerformerListener.onCommandSend(boolean, int).

        Request enter ota.CommandType=PerformerListener.TYPE_REQUEST_ENTER_OTA

        返回:
        Added to the queue result.

        Set camera status.CommandType=PerformerListener.TYPE_SET_CAMERA_STATUS.
        参数:

      • cmd_setLanguage

        boolean cmd_setLanguage(byte languageType)
        Set wristband language.CommandType=PerformerListener.TYPE_SET_LANGUAGE
        参数:
        languageType - 0x01 简体中文 0x02 繁体中文 0x03 英语 0x04 德语 0x05 俄语 0x06 西班牙语 0x07 葡萄牙语 0x08 法语 0x09 日语 0xff 如果不是上面9种语言，设置为0xff
        返回:
        Added to the queue result.

      • restartWristband

        boolean restartWristband()
        Request restart wristband.

        After receiving the instruction, the device will return the result of request restart wristband.PerformerListener.onRestartWristband(boolean).

        返回:
        Added to the queue result.

      • userUnBind

        boolean userUnBind()
        Unbind user.

        After receiving the instruction, the device will return the result of unbind.PerformerListener.onUserUnBind(boolean)

        返回:
        Added to the queue result.

      • openHealthyRealTimeData

        boolean openHealthyRealTimeData(int healthyType)
        Open health real time data. The open result send to PerformerListener.onOpenHealthyRealTimeData(int, boolean)

        Each time the real time data is turned on, it will last for a certain period of time. If you don't call closeHealthyRealTimeData(int) method before the end of time, it will automatically close. And PerformerListener.onCloseGSensor() will callback.

        参数:
        healthyType - Real time data. HEALTHY_TYPE_HEART_RATE HEALTHY_TYPE_OXYGEN HEALTHY_TYPE_BLOOD_PRESSURE HEALTHY_TYPE_RESPIRATORY_RATE HEALTHY_TYPE_ECG
        返回:
        Added to the queue result.

      • closeHealthyRealTimeData

        boolean closeHealthyRealTimeData(int healthyType)
        Close health real time data. And PerformerListener.onCloseHealthyRealTimeData(int) will callback.
        参数:
        healthyType - Real time data. HEALTHY_TYPE_HEART_RATE HEALTHY_TYPE_OXYGEN HEALTHY_TYPE_BLOOD_PRESSURE HEALTHY_TYPE_RESPIRATORY_RATE HEALTHY_TYPE_ECG
        返回:
        Added to the queue result.

      • openGSensor

        boolean openGSensor()
        Open GSensor data The open result send to PerformerListener.onOpenGSensor(boolean)
        返回:
        Added to the queue result.

      • closeGSensor

        boolean closeGSensor()
        Close GSensor data The close result send to PerformerListener.onCloseGSensor()
        返回:
        Added to the queue result.

      • syncData

        boolean syncData()
        Start sync data.

        PerformerListener.onSyncDataStart(int) PerformerListener.onSyncDataEnd(boolean) PerformerListener.onSyncDataResult(List) PerformerListener.onSyncDataTodayTotalData(TodayTotalData)

        返回:
        Added to the queue result.
